attributes.action: make it a legal requirement for uk based online subscription services to offer online cancelation services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are an increasing number of online business who happily allow you to sign up for their services online, but do not offer an online cancellation service.

This is a tactic commonly used to dissuade consumers from discontinuing services with the company.

It should be a legal requirement to offer this facility online to protect consumer interests.
